params.creator: The address of the market creator (for factory pattern, can be msg.sender if direct call)
params.initialSide: The side the creator is predicting (Yes or No)
params.initialStake: The amount the creator must stake (put your money where your mouth is)
params.question: The prediction question

returns.marketId: The ID of the created market

returns._0: uint256[] Array of all market IDs
Market struct with current market data

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.marketId: The ID of the market to pause

params.side: The side to predict (Yes or No)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.marketId: The ID of the market to resolve

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculatePotentialWinnings(uint256,uint8.notice: Calculate potential winnings for a stake

getFees(uint256).notice: Get platform and creator fees for a market

getMarkets(uint256,uint256).notice: Get multiple markets at once (gas efficient for frontend)

getOdds(uint256,uint8).notice: Get current odds for a side (as percentage)

getUserPrediction(uint256,address).notice: Get user's prediction for a market

pauseMarket(uint256).notice: Emergency pause (owner only) - prevents new predictions

predict(uint256,uint8,uint256).notice: Make a prediction (stake on YES or NO)
